mapper.select: SELECT a.tenant_code, a.team_code, a.skill_code, a.skill_name, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time FROM oc_team_skill a WHERE a.tenant_code = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.skill_code = #{skillCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.flag = '1'

SELECT a.id, a.tenant_code, a.team_code, a.skill_code, a.skill_name, a.flag, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, b.team_name FROM oc_team_skill a LEFT JOIN oc_team b ON a.team_code = b.team_code WHERE a.flag = '1' AND b.flag = '1' AND a.tenant_code = 1 AND a.team_code = 1 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
